Summary: Strong bright light. It looked like a star but was too close to be one.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside to get some air when i noticed it in the sky. It was too bright and too close to be a star. I looked at it for at least an hour and a half. It seemed to have bright blue, what looked like feeler's coming off it. It also released what looked like small probes red and green in color. It seemed to track through the sky with slow short and abroupt movements. No air craft or blipms fly in the area i was looking at, also there where no identifying marker's on this object.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around October 13th 2010
